named-query.name: Employee.findByName
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM Employee e WHERE e.name = :ename

named-query.name: Employee.findByBirthday
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM Employee e WHERE e.birthday = ?1

named-query.name: Employee.findByDepartmentName
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM Employee e INNER JOIN e.belongTo b INNER JOIN b.department d WHERE d.name = :name

named-query.name: Employee.getName
named-query.query: SELECT e.name FROM Employee e WHERE e.id = :id

named-native-query.name: Employee.getCount
named-native-query.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM Employee e

named-native-query.name: Employee.getCountByBloodType
named-native-query.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM Employee e WHERE e.bloodType = ?1
